name: flaminGO!
description:
flaminGO!

Wow, what a beautiful flamingo you are! Life is all about flying around with your flamingo friends—until disaster strikes… A negligent toad falls on you, causing you to lose all of your feathers. That was embarrassing. Now, you must catch up with your flock, collecting feathers to earn speed boosts, avoiding tricky spikes, and making epic jumps along the way. If you’re fast enough, you might make it to the Top 10 Leaderboard and cement your place in flaminGO! history. Hurry, I saw your flamingo girlfriend talking to a guy with a lot of feathers.

How To Play
  • A: Move left
  • D: Move right
  • Space: Jump (release early for a shorter jump; hold for a higher jump and to decrease your fall speed)
  • S - Fast fall
  • Mouse/Left Click - Menu navigation
Credits
  • Programming + Art + Game Design: Cody Selman  (Twitch, Twitter, Itch)
  • Sound Design + Music: Jeff Alvarez (Website)
Special Thanks
  • Cover Art: Lurkin (Twitter)
  • Art Consultant + Waterfall Art: Weston Mansfield
  • QA + Play Testing + Snacks: Alex Marotto
  • Itch Page Copy Consultant: Jenna Dousi
  • Everyone who hung out with me on Twitch while I was making this game :)
